snippet: The Lloyds Banking Group set aside an additional $1.6 billion to compensate clients who were sold insurance inappropriately, as the firm reported a net loss in the third quarter.
abstract: The Lloyds Banking Group set aside an additional $1.6 billion to compensate clients who were sold insurance inappropriately, as the firm reported a net loss in the third quarter.

headline.main: Hurt by $1.6 Billion Charge, Lloyds Bank Posts a Loss
